verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ianao Mpandahatra,
Mpandefa hafatra,
Ka famonjena ho anay.
Ã” ! raisonao, ry Ray,
Ny haja entinay,
Ny dera, ho fisaoranay.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
'Lay fanomezana,
Fampaherezana
Natolotra ho anay, ry Ray,
Kristy anjara soa,
Fiadanana tokoa
Sy tena loharanon-tsoa.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ny hasoavana
Ny fihavanana,
Natobakao ho anay
No mampiray izao,
Sy saina vaovao,
Ka avy aminao, ry Ray.
